resources.string:
680g salmon fillets
3 Tbsp Honey Mustard
3 cloves garlic, minced
3 Tbsp olive oil
1 Tbsp lemon juice
1 Tbsp chopped fresh dill
Pinch of salt

4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
1/4 tsp salt
1/8tsp black pepper
6 slices Swiss cheese
4 slices cooked ham
1/2 cup seasoned bread crumbs
